metadata.title: CVE-2021-35197 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: In MediaWiki before 1.31.15, 1.32.x through 1.35.x before 1.35.3, and 1.36.x before 1.36.1, bots have certain unintended API access. When a bot account has a "sitewide block" applied, it is able to still "purge" pages through the MediaWiki Action API (which a "sitewide block" should have prevented).

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
